sentence.text: E168d2 apoptotic process carry a frameshift mutation in the positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II activation domain, Glu168del2, which is associated with severe dominant CoRD or clathrin coat assembly in humans.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: As seen in human patients, heterozygous E168d2 (AAAAAAE168d2/+AAAAAA) but not R90W (AAAAAAR90W/+AAAAAA) apoptotic process show severely impaired retinal function, while mice homozygous for either mutation are blind and undergo rapid photoreceptor degeneration.
